branchCategory.name: VDW10/12/14, Compact Direct Operated 2 Port Solenoid Valve for Air/Water/Medium Vacuum, Single Unit
branchCategory.description: <p>The VDW size 1 is available with resin, brass or stainless steel body with orifice size up to 1/16 inch. Resin body is offered with one touch fitting to reduce installation time. Maximum Cv is 0.07.</p>
